Packages that use LossFunction
Package
Description
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training
Defines the concepts related for training an estimation function
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss
Provides the different loss functions used for training

  • Uses of LossFunction in net.tvburger.jdl.model.training

    Subinterfaces of LossFunction in net.tvburger.jdl.model.training
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    ObjectiveFunction
    Represents an objective function that extends the concept of a LossFunction to provide both loss aggregation and gradient computation.

  • Uses of LossFunction in net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss

    Subinterfaces of LossFunction in net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    BatchLossFunction
    Represents a loss function that operates at the batch level, i.e., across multiple samples.
    interface 
    DimensionLossFunction
    Represents a specialized loss function that operates on a single dimension of a predicted versus target value.
    interface 
    SampleLossFunction
    Represents a loss function that operates at the sample level, i.e., over an entire set of estimated versus target values rather than a single dimension.
    Classes in net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss that implement LossFunction
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BinaryCrossEntropy
    Binary Cross-Entropy (BCE) loss function.
    class 
    MeanError
    A loss function implementation that computes the mean error across samples or batches.
    class 
    ScaledError
    A decorator loss function that applies a fixed scaling factor to the results of another loss function.
    class 
    SquaredError
    A DimensionLossFunction that computes the squared error between an estimated value and its target value.
    class 
    SummedError
    A loss function implementation that computes the sum of errors rather than their mean.
    Constructors in net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss with parameters of type LossFunction
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    ScaledError(float scale, LossFunction lossFunction)
    Creates a new ScaledError that decorates the given LossFunction with a scaling factor.
